project.name: C-C078A-FFMP-07-ST04-DT07-DF06-CF24-01
project.description: Creating test case using base program. Added an environment variable read to get a key in order to read in data from shared memory. Completed injection.

build_commands.command: awk -v compiler="$SS_CC" '/CC=gcc/{gsub(/gcc/, compiler)};{print}' config.mak.bak > config.mak && true

iopair.name: C-C078A-FFMP-07-ST04-DT07-DF06-CF24-01-GOOD-01
iopair.description: remove the audio from a video Read a string from the input. Do nslookup on that string, without checking first if it has any command separators. This allows the user to run arbitrary commands.

process.script: nohup shm_setup -k 4019 -s 28 -m "10" -o /opt/stonesoup/workspace/inputDaemons/shared_memory_01.id > /opt/stonesoup/workspace/inputDaemons/shared_memory_01.out 2>&1 & echo $! > /opt/stonesoup/workspace/inputDaemons/shared_memory_01.pid && echo "Shared memory created"

if [[ -f "/opt/stonesoup/workspace/inputDaemons/shared_memory_01.pid" ]]; then killtree.sh -s 9 -p $(cat "/opt/stonesoup/workspace/inputDaemons/shared_memory_01.pid") && echo "Killed shared memory server."; else echo "Failed: Shared memory server PID file does not exist."; fi

if [[ -f "/opt/stonesoup/workspace/inputDaemons/shared_memory_01.id" ]]; then ipcrm -m $(cat "/opt/stonesoup/workspace/inputDaemons/shared_memory_01.id") && echo "Deleted shared memory segment."; else echo "Failed: Shared memory ID file does not exist."; fi

scoring_formula.formula: (GOOD-01-CENTOS OR GOOD-01-UBUNTU OR GOOD-01-DEBIAN) AND NOT TIMEOUT AND NOT CONTROLLED_EXIT

iopair.name: C-C078A-FFMP-07-ST04-DT07-DF06-CF24-01-BAD-01
iopair.description: Read a string from the input. Do nslookup on that string, without checking first if it has any command separators. This allows the user to run arbitrary commands.

process.script: nohup shm_setup -k 4019 -s 28 -m "10; ls -la" -o /opt/stonesoup/workspace/inputDaemons/shared_memory_01.id > /opt/stonesoup/workspace/inputDaemons/shared_memory_01.out 2>&1 & echo $! > /opt/stonesoup/workspace/inputDaemons/shared_memory_01.pid && echo "Shared memory created"

if [[ -f "/opt/stonesoup/workspace/inputDaemons/shared_memory_01.id" ]]; then ipcrm -m $(cat "/opt/stonesoup/workspace/inputDaemons/shared_memory_01.id") && echo "Deleted shared memory segment."; else echo "Failed: Shared memory ID file does not exist."; fi

scoring_formula.formula: weakness_started_URIBTzpfVnlFMgTjgzyr AND ((NOT PERFORMER AND (ls_output_8QjxUOJ1PA OR echo_output_87lv9XpEds) AND NOT timeout_7Q5XIuMH4F) or (PERFORMER AND NOT ((ls_output_8QjxUOJ1PA OR echo_output_87lv9XpEds) OR timeout_7Q5XIuMH4F)))
(NOT PERFORMER AND (ls_output_8QjxUOJ1PA OR echo_output_87lv9XpEds) AND NOT timeout_7Q5XIuMH4F) or (PERFORMER AND NOT ((ls_output_8QjxUOJ1PA OR echo_output_87lv9XpEds) OR timeout_7Q5XIuMH4F))
